subject: JUnit timeout question
msgSnippet: Hi All, I need to run some long multithreaded load tests with JUnit, but I find the tests fail before completion at exactly 1200 seconds. Is this a global
messageBody:
Hi All,
I need to run some long multithreaded load tests with JUnit, but I find the tests fail before completion at exactly 1200 seconds. Is this a global timeout JUnit has? I'm annotating the test with @Test(timeout = xxxxx) to try to bypass this restriction, but it's not working.
Any suggestions to make this work?
Thanks a lot,
Marcelo.
